name: The Last Crucible
description:
A 3rd Person Souls-Like Game.

After a  successful yet costly conquest, the final Crucible Knight Zangard is the last remaining bulwark standing in your way. Your father, the army's commander, has decided to give the troops a chance to recuperate their losses. However, you will not let your community slowly perish while the resources necessary to save them lies in front of you. You decide to take matters into your own hands, and take on Zangard alone.
